name: Morbius
syno: Doctor Michael Morbius (Jared Leto) is a biochemist suffering from a strange blood disease. In order to heal himself and respond to his disturbance, in the process, he inadvertently becomes infected with a form of vampirism.

name: Soul
syno: A music teacher who has lost his passion is transported out of his body to the Great Before and must find his way back with the help of a child soul who learns about himself.

name: Us
syno: Adelaide Wilson, her husband and their two children visit the beach house where she grew up. There, Adelaide has a sinister premonition that precedes a horrifying encounter: four masked men show up at her house. When the masks are removed, the family can see that the individuals are identical to them.

name: The Joker
syno: Arthur Fleck loves to make people laugh, but his career as a comedian is a flop. Social rejection, marginalization and a series of tragic events lead him down the path of madness and, finally, he falls into the world of crime.

name: Smile
syno: After witnessing a strange and traumatic incident involving a patient, Dr. Rose Cotter begins to experience terrifying events that she cannot explain.

name: A Dog Journey
syno: Ethan and his young granddaughter CJ live on a Michigan farm with their dog Bailey. When CJ's mother decides to take her daughter away, Bailey will try to always accompany the little girl, even if it means reincarnating as other dogs to fulfill her mission.

name: Serenity
syno: Baker Dill is a fishing boat captain whose quiet existence is disrupted when his ex-wife asks him to murder her violent husband. Brought back to a life he would rather forget, Baker must choose between good and evil.

name: Thor: Ragnarok
syno: Thor is imprisoned at the other end of the universe. He needs to get back in time to stop the all-powerful Hela from destroying his world, but to escape her confinement and prevent the apocalypse, he'll have to first defeat the Incredible Hulk in a gladiatorial tournament.

name: Granizo
syno: A famous television meteorologist becomes public enemy number one when he fails to prevent a terrible hail storm.

name: Jhon Wick 2
syno: Legendary assassin John Wick is forced out of retirement by a former associate trying to control a sinister international group of assassins. Compelled by a blood oath to help, John travels to Rome to face off against some of the world's deadliest assassins.

name: Venom
syno: Journalist Eddie Brock is investigating Carlton Drake, the famous founder of the Life Foundation. Brock establishes a symbiosis with an alien entity that offers him superpowers, but the being takes over his personality and turns him evil.

name: The Girl of the Train
syno: Rachel Watson, a woman with an alcohol problem who envy how little she can see of the perfect life of Scott and Megan, the couple whose house she passes every day on her way to work, discovers that something terrible has happened in the house and decides to meddle to try to solve the riddle.

name: The 5th Wave
syno: Following a planned 4-wave alien invasion of Earth that has wiped out nearly all of humanity, young Cassie Sullivan tries to find her little brother while trying to survive alongside other survivors.

name: Red
syno: Mei Lee, an odd but confident 13-year-old girl, is torn between being the dutiful daughter her mother wants her to be and the chaos of adolescence.

name: Pig
syno: A truffle hunter travels to Portland from the Oregon desert to find the person who stole his beloved pig.

name: Old
syno: A paradisiacal vacation turns into a nightmare when a family visits a beach where, for some reason, they age rapidly, reducing their entire life to a single day.

name: The Invitation
syno: After her mother's death and no known relatives left, Evie takes a DNA test and discovers a distant cousin she never knew she had.
Climate change has caused the need to use artificial oxygen to breathe. With his wife sick and little hope of survival, Ethan is forced to travel to the future to save humans.

name: The Requin
syno: Following a tropical storm, a couple on a romantic getaway find themselves adrift at sea when water washes over their villa. In order to survive, they are forced to battle the elements as sharks surround them.

name: So Cold The River
syno: A documentary filmmaker becomes obsessed with the person she should be making a film about: an elusive millionaire who donates vast fortunes to the community. While investigating it, he realizes that there is a terrible evil force in the place.

name: Kadaver
syno: After a nuclear catastrophe, a starving family roams the streets. The family meets some individuals who take shelter in a hotel, where a man offers them food in exchange for attending a singularly sinister play.

name: It: Chapter Two
syno: In the mysterious town of Derry, an evil clown named Pennywise returns 27 years later to torment the grown-up members of the Losers' Club, who are now further apart from each other.

name: Breathe
syno: After contracting polio and with a few months to live, Robin Cavendish tries to help other patients and the disabled.

name: The Sea Beast
syno: A fearless girl and a famous sea monster hunter join forces to find a powerful beast.

name: Drifting Home
syno: Kousuke and Natsume have been friends since childhood. One day, they visit a housing complex that will soon be demolished but while playing they get caught up in a strange phenomenon.

name: Minari
syno: A Korean-American family moves to a small Arkansas farm in search of their own American dream.

name: Passengers
syno: Two passengers traveling in hibernation to a distant planet wake up, due to a technical error, 90 years before reaching their destination. Alone and surrounded by luxuries, love arises between them; However, they discover that there is a fault in the ship and they will have to repair it in time to save the 5,000 people who remain hibernating, and themselves.

name: The nun
syno: A nun commits suicide in a Romanian abbey and the Vatican sends a priest and a novice to investigate what happened. What they both find there is a wicked secret that will bring them face to face with evil in its purest essence.

name: Captain Marvel
syno: The warrior Vers does not remember her past, which comes back to her in dreams. Despite her trouble controlling her emotions, and with them her powers, the Supreme Intelligence allows her to go on a mission. With the help of Nick Fury, he will try to discover the secrets of his past while using his powers to end the war.

name: The Imitation Game
syno: Biopic about the British mathematician Alan Turing, famous for deciphering the secret Nazi codes contained in the Enigma machine. His invention determined the future of the Second World War (1939-1945) in favor of the Allies. Far from being admired as a hero, Turing was charged and tried for his homosexuality in 1952.

name: My Policeman
syno: Tom, a policeman in 1950s Britain, falls in love with a schoolteacher in Brighton's seaside. However, he soon begins a passionate same-sex affair with a museum curator.

name: Mulan
syno: The Chinese emperor issues a decree requiring each household to recruit a male to fight with the imperial army in the war against the Huns. In order to save her elderly father from this duty, his only daughter Fa Mulan poses as a soldier and takes his place.

name: A Monster Calls
syno: After the separation of his parents, Connor has to take the reins of his house since his mother is sick with cancer. The little boy will try to overcome his fears and phobias with the help of a monster he meets every night.

name: Nope
syno: The keepers of a California horse ranch come across a mysterious force that affects human and animal behavior.

name: Father of the Bride
syno: A father approaches his daughter's upcoming wedding through the prism of multiple relationships within a large and sprawling Cuban-American clan.

name: Lightyear
syno: Buzz Lightyear embarks on an intergalactic adventure with a group of ambitious recruits and their robot partner. The friends will have to learn to work together to escape the evil Zurg and his army of robots.

name: The Tomorrow War
syno: A group of time travelers is transported from the year 2051 to deliver an urgent message: humanity is losing the world war against aliens. The only hope is for the citizens of the present to join the fight.

name: Parasite
syno: Both Gi Taek and his family are out of work. When his eldest son, Gi Woo, begins teaching private lessons at the wealthy Park home, the two families, who have much in common despite being from two totally different worlds, strike up a relationship with unpredictable results.

name: Cam
syno: After being conned, a young woman plans to unmask the mysterious phony posing as her and regain her identity.

name: Moana
syno: Vaiana Waialiki is a young sea enthusiast and the only daughter of a sailor chief. When the sailors of her village can't catch any fish and all the crops fail, Moana discovers that the demigod Maui caused the misfortune after stealing the heart of the goddess Te Fiti.

name: Pinocchio
syno: When Geppetto the carpenter sees a shooting star, he wishes that the puppet he just finished, Pinocchio, could become a real boy. In the night, the Blue Fairy grants Geppetto's wish and asks Jiminy Cricket to be his conscience.

name: After Ever Happy
syno: A couple must decide whether to continue their passionate but toxic relationship or make dramatic changes to their lives.

name: Lighthouse
syno: In the 1890s, two lighthouse keepers facing a four-week shift together battle the constant temptation to indulge in madness on a remote and mysterious New England island.

name: Minions: The Rise of Gru
syno: In the 1970s, Gru grows up a big fan of The Wild Six, a supergroup of villains. To show them that he can be evil, Gru hatches a plan in hopes of joining the gang. Luckily, he has the help of his loyal followers, the Minions, always ready to wreak havoc.

name: Fahrenheit 451
syno: In a dystopian reality where books are banned and burned, a firefighter begins reading in secret and discovers an underground rebellion committed to protecting literature.

name: Luca
syno: Luca is a sea monster who lives below a town on the Italian coast. When he comes to the surface, he takes on a human appearance, and meets a new friend, just like him. Together they embark on an adventure between humans who hate monsters.

name: Carter
syno: Following a deadly pandemic that has devastated the United States and North Korea, an agent is drawn into a mysterious mission. With no memories, he finds a device in his head. A voice in his ears gives him orders to avoid being killed.

name: Finding Dory
syno: With the help of Marlin and his son Nemo, Dory, who suffers from short-term memory loss, decides to go on a long journey in search of her parents, whom she lost years ago.

name: Doctor Strange
syno: Dr. Stephen Strange opens a portal to the multiverse by using a forbidden spell. Now your team must face a threat that could destroy everything.

name: Hustle
syno: A struggling basketball scout discovers a player with enormous talent but a difficult past. Without his team's approval, he decides to take it with him. It will be the last chance to show that both are worthy of the NBA.

name: Slumberland
syno: A young woman discovers a secret map to the dream world of Slumberland and, with the help of an eccentric outlaw, traverses dream reality and flees nightmares in hopes of seeing her late father again.
